inclusion.criterion: New York Heart Association (NYHA) class II-IV despite optimal medical therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: sinus rhythm and 'true' LBBB according to Strauss criteria on a 12-lead ECG
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Acute myocardial infarction or Coronary By-pass Grafting within the preceding three months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of acromegaly due to pituitary adenoma and underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He takes only vitamin D and multivitamins after the surgery.
